description.english: You awoke in the Master's house and have managed to escape. But the nightmare has only just begun.
description.schinese: 在“主人”的洋馆中醒来并成功脱逃，但是噩梦才刚刚开始。
description.turkish: Üstadın evinde uyandın ve kaçmayı başardın. Ancak kabus daha yeni başladı.
description.german: Du bist im Haus des Meisters erwacht und dir ist die Flucht gelungen. Doch der Alptraum hat gerade erst angefangen.
description.french: Vous vous êtes réveillée dans la maison du Maître et avez réussi à vous échapper. Mais le cauchemar ne fait que commencer.
description.brazilian: Você acordou na mansão do Mestre e conseguiu escapar. Mas o pesadelo apenas começou.
description.koreana: 당신은 스승님의 집에서 깨어났고 탈출에 성공했습니다. 하지만 악몽은 이제 막 시작했을 뿐이다.
description.japanese: マスターの家で目覚めたあなたはなんとか逃げ出したが、悪夢はまだ始まったばかりである
description.russian: Вы проснулись в доме Магистра и сумели сбежать из него. Но худшее ещё впереди.
description.romanian: Te-ai trezit în conacul Maestrului și ai reușit să scapi. Dar coșmarul abia a început.
description.italian: Ti sei svegliata nella casa del Padrone e sei riuscita a scappare. Ma l'incubo è appena iniziato.
description.spanish: Te has despertado en la casa del Maestro y has conseguido escapar. Pero la pesadilla no ha hecho más que empezar.
description.hungarian: Felébredtél a Mester házában, és sikerült elmenekülnöd. A rémálom azonban még csak most kezdődött el.

displayName.brazilian: O que foi que eu fiz!?

description.english: Open the gates of darkness and let the minions out.
description.schinese: 打开阴界大门时，无意间释放了那里的怪物。
description.turkish: Karanlığın kapılarını açın ve kölelerin dışarı çıkmasına izin verin.
description.german: Öffne die Tore zur Dunkelheit und lasse die Diener heraus.
description.french: Ouvrez les portes de l'obscurité et laissez sortir les sous-fifres.
description.brazilian: Abra os portões da escuridão e liberte os monstros.
description.japanese: 闇の門を開き、ミニオンを外に出す
description.russian: Откройте врата тьмы и выпустите приспешников.
description.romanian: Deschide porțile întunericului și lasă minionii să iasă.
description.italian: Apri le porte dell'oscurità e fai uscire i servitori.
description.spanish: Abre las puertas de la oscuridad y deja salir a los secuaces.
description.hungarian: Kinyitottad a sötétség kapuit, és kiengedted a kegyenceket.

description.english: Listen to the radio show inside the office from start to finish.
description.schinese: 在办公室里听完电台节目。
description.turkish: Ofisteki radyo programını baştan sona dinleyin.
description.german: Höre dir die Radiosendung im Büro von Anfang bis Ende an.
description.french: Écoutez l'émission de radio à l'intérieur du bureau du début à la fin.
description.brazilian: Escute o programa da rádio no escritório até o fim.
description.koreana: 사무실 안에서 처음부터 끝까지 라디오 방송을 들어보세요.
description.japanese: オフィス内のラジオ番組を全て聞く
description.russian: Прослушайте радиошоу в офисе от начала и до конца.
description.romanian: Ascultă emisiunea radio de la început până la sfârsit.
description.italian: Ascolta il programma radiofonico nell'ufficio, dall'inizio alla fine.
description.spanish: Escucha el programa de radio dentro de la oficina de principio a fin.
description.hungarian: Végighallgattad a rádióműsort az irodában az elejétől a végéig.

description.english: Unlock the mysterious key known as Key to the Unknown [Special item].
description.schinese: 解锁秘境之匙[特殊物品]。
description.turkish: Bilinmeyenin Anahtarı [Özel eşya] isimli gizemli anahtarı satın alın.
description.german: Schalte den mysteriösen Schlüssel frei, auch bekannt als Schlüssel zum Unbekannten [Spezialgegenstand].
description.french: Déverrouillez la mystérieuse clé connue sous le nom de Clé de l'Inconnu [Objet spécial].
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a chave misteriosa conhecida como Chave para o Desconhecido [Item Especial].
description.koreana: 알 수 없는 [특수 아이템]의 열쇠로 알려진 신비로운 키를 해제하십시오.
description.japanese: 「未知への鍵」と呼ばれる謎の鍵を解き明かす【特別アイテム】
description.russian: Заполучите ключ, известный как Ключ к неизвестному [особый предмет].
description.romanian: Deblochează cheia misterioasă cunoscută sub numele de Cheie către Necunoscut [obiect special].
description.italian: Sblocca la chiave misteriosa conosciuta come Chiave dell'ignoto [Oggetto speciale].
description.spanish: Desbloquea la misteriosa llave conocida como LLAVE de lo Desconocido [Objeto Especial].
description.hungarian: Feloldottad az ismeretlen kulcsának [különleges tárgy] hívott titokzatos kulcsot.

description.english: Unlock the main gate.
description.schinese: 解锁大门。
description.german: Öffne das Haupttor.
description.french: Ouvrez la porte principale.
description.brazilian: Destranque o portão principal.
description.japanese: 正門を開錠する
description.italian: Sblocca il cancello principale.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la puerta principal.
description.hungarian: Kinyitottad a főkaput.

description.english: Read the shocking news.
description.schinese: 看了一则令人震惊的新闻。
description.german: Lies die schockierenden Nachrichten.
description.french: Lisez les journaux choquants.
description.brazilian: Leia as notícias chocantes.
description.japanese: 衝撃的なニュースを読む
description.italian: Leggi l'oltraggiosa notizia.
description.spanish: Lee las impactantes noticias.
description.hungarian: Elolvastad a sokkoló híreket.

description.english: Meet Paul, another survivor.
description.schinese: 与另一位幸存者保罗相遇。
description.turkish: Bir başka kurtulan Paul ile tanışın.
description.german: Triff Paul, einen weiteren Überlebenden.
description.french: Rencontrez Paul, un autre survivant.
description.brazilian: Encontre Paul, outro sobrevivente.
description.japanese: もう一人のサバイバー、ポールの紹介
description.romanian: Fă cunoștință cu Paul, un alt supraviețuitor.
description.italian: Incontra Paul, un altro sopravvissuto.
description.spanish: Conoce a Paul, otro superviviente.
description.hungarian: Találkoztál Paullal, egy másik túlélővel.

description.english: Listen to any Famous LP record from start to finish.
description.schinese: 听完任意一盘演奏名曲的黑胶唱片。
description.turkish: Baştan sona herhangi bir Famous LP kaydını dinleyin.
description.german: Höre dir eine berühmte Schallplatte von Anfang bis Ende an.
description.french: Écoutez n'importe quel disque Famous LP du début à la fin.
description.brazilian: Escute qualquer disco famoso até o fim.
description.koreana: 유명한 LP 레코드를 처음부터 끝까지 들어보세요.
description.japanese: 有名なレコード盤をすべて聴く
description.russian: Прослушайте любую из виниловых пластинок от начала и до конца.
description.romanian: Ascultă orice disc LP faimos de la început până la sfârșit.
description.italian: Ascolta un qualsiasi disco famoso dall'inizio alla fine.
description.spanish: Escucha cualquier disco de Famous LP de principio a fin.
description.hungarian: Végighallgattad valamelyik híres lemezt az elejétől a végéig.

description.english: Enter the abandoned cabin.
description.schinese: 进入废弃小屋。
description.german: Betritt die verlassene Hütte.
description.french: Entrez dans la cabane abandonnée.
description.brazilian: Entre na cabana abandonada.
description.japanese: 廃墟の小屋に入る
description.italian: Entra nella baita abbandonata.
description.spanish: Entra en la cabaña abandonada.
description.hungarian: Beléptél az elhagyatott faházba.

description.english: Defeat the zombie named Adrian Bennet.
description.schinese: 战胜名为艾德里安•本尼特的丧尸。
description.german: Besiege den Zombie namens Adrian Bennet.
description.french: Battez le zombie nommé Adrian Bennet.
description.brazilian: Derrote o zumbi Adrian Bennet.
description.japanese: エイドリアン・ベネットというゾンビを倒す
description.russian: Убейте зомби по имени Адриан Беннет.
description.italian: Sconfiggi lo zombie di nome Adrian Bennet.
description.spanish: Derrota al zombi llamado Adrian Bennet.
description.hungarian: Legyőzted az Adrian Bennet nevű zombit.

description.english: Kill a stalker while executing an instant-death attack.
description.schinese: 在潜行者发动即死攻击时反杀它。
description.turkish: Anında ölüm saldırısı yaparken bir takipçiyi öldürün.
description.german: Besiege einen Pirscher während einem sofortigen Tötungsangriff.
description.french: Tuer un stalker en exécutant une attaque de mort instantanée.
description.brazilian: Mate um perseguidor com um ataque instantâneo.
description.koreana: 즉사 공격을 실행하는 동안 스토커를 처치하십시오.
description.japanese: 即死攻撃を実行しながら、ストーカーを殺す
description.russian: Убейте сталкера, выполняя мгновенную смертельную атаку.
description.romanian: Omoară un vânător în timp ce incearcă să execute un atac mortal.
description.italian: Uccidi uno stalker mentre esegui un attacco mortale.
description.spanish: Mata a un acosador mientras ejecutas un ataque de muerte instantánea.
description.hungarian: Megölted a cserkészőt, miközben végrehajtottál egy azonnali halálos támadást.

displayName.spanish: La vida de Los mil Dioses

description.english: Kill all the shadow creatures on Fog Island.
description.schinese: 杀死雾之岛上的所有暗影生物。
description.turkish: Sis Adası'ndaki tüm gölge yaratıkları öldürün.
description.german: Töte alle Schattenkreaturen auf der Nebelinsel.
description.french: Tuez toutes les créatures des ombres sur Fog Island.
description.brazilian: Mate todas as criaturas das sombras na Ilha do Nevoeiro.
description.koreana: 안개 섬의 모든 그림자 생물체를 죽이십시오.
description.japanese: 霧の島の影武者をすべて倒す
description.russian: Убейте всех призрачных существ на Туманном острове.
description.romanian: Omoară toate creaturile întunericului de pe Insula Cețoasă.
description.italian: Uccidi tutte le creature d'ombra sull'Isola della Nebbia.
description.spanish: Mata a todas las criaturas de las sombras en la Isla de la Niebla.
description.hungarian: Megölted az összes árnylényt a Ködszigeten.

description.english: Put an end to the Gardener spreading the infection on the island.
description.schinese: 杀死在岛上传播传染病的园丁。
description.turkish: Bahçıvanın adaya enfeksiyon yaymasına son verin.
description.german: Setze dem Gärtner ein Ende, der die Infektion über die Insel verbreitet.
description.french: Mettez fin à l’infection propagée par le Jardinier sur l’île.
description.brazilian: Acabe com a infecção espalhada pelo Jardineiro.
description.japanese: 島に感染を広げる庭師に終止符を打つ
description.russian: Убейте садовника, распространяющего инфекцию по острову.
description.romanian: Pune capăt zilelor grădinarului care răspândește infecția pe insulă.
description.italian: Poni fine all'esistenza del Giardiniere che sta diffondendo l'infezione sull'isola.
description.spanish: Acaba con el jardinero que propaga la infección en la isla.
description.hungarian: Végeztél a fertőzést terjesztő kertésszel a szigeten.

description.english: Find a  way to unlock the bow-gun mechanism.
description.schinese: 成功解开弓枪的锁。
description.turkish: Baş tabanca mekanizmasının kilidini açmanın bir yolunu bulun.
description.german: Finde einen Weg um die Verriegelung der Armbrust aufzuschließen.
description.french: Trouvez un moyen de débloquer le mécanisme de l’arbalète.
description.brazilian: Descubra como desbloquear o mecanismo de fuzilarco.
description.koreana: 활총 메커니즘을 잠금 해제하는 방법을 찾으십시오.
description.japanese: ボウガンの装置を解除する方法を探す
description.russian: Найдите способ разблокировать механизм многозарядного арбалета
description.italian: Trova un modo per sbloccare il meccanismo della pistola ad arco.
description.spanish: Encuentra la forma de desbloquear el mecanismo de la ballesta.
description.hungarian: Megoldást találtál az íjpuska mechanizmusának kinyitására.

description.english: Enter Dr. Arnold Howard's research chamber.
description.schinese: 进入阿诺德•霍华德博士的研究室。
description.turkish: Dr. Arnold Howard'ın araştırma odasına girin.
description.german: Betritt Dr. Arnold Howards Forschungskammer.
description.french: Entrez dans le laboratoire du Dr. Arnold Howard.
description.brazilian: Entre na câmara de pesquisas do Dr. Arnold Howard.
description.japanese: アーノルド・ハワード博士の研究室に入る
description.russian: Войдите в комнату доктора Арнольда Говарда.
description.romanian: Intră în camera de cercetare a doctorului Arnold Howard.
description.italian: Entra nella camera di ricerca del dottor Arnold Howard.
description.spanish: Entra en la cámara de investigación del Dr. Arnold Howard.
description.hungarian: Beléptél Dr. Arnold Howard kutatótermébe.

description.english: Unlock the door to the old tower.
description.schinese: 打开通往废塔的门。
description.german: Öffne die Tür zum alten Turm.
description.french: Débloquez la porte de l’ancienne tour.
description.brazilian: Destranque a porta para a torre antiga.
description.japanese: 旧タワーの扉を開ける
description.romanian: Deblochează ușa de la turnul cel vechi.
description.italian: Sblocca la porta della vecchia torre.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la puerta de la vieja torre.
description.hungarian: Kinyitottad a régi torony ajtaját.

displayName.english: This Coffin Has Your Name On It!
displayName.french: Ce cercueil est marqué de ton nom !
displayName.brazilian: Seu Nome Está Escrito Neste Caixão!
displayName.koreana: 이 관에는 당신 이름이 새겨져 있어요!
displayName.japanese: This Coffin Has Your Name On It!
displayName.romanian: Sicriul Ăsta Are Numele Tău Pe El!
displayName.italian: Questa bara ha il tuo nome sopra!
displayName.hungarian: Ezen a koporsón szerepel a neved

description.english: Defeat Gate Keeper in the courtyard.
description.schinese: 在庭院战胜“守门人”。
description.german: Besiege den Torwächter im Hof.
description.french: Battez Le Gardien dans la cour.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Guardião no cemitério.
description.japanese: 中庭の門番を倒す
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Guardiano nel cortile.
description.spanish: Derrota al Guardián de la Puerta en el patio.
description.hungarian: Legyőzted a kapuőrt az udvaron.

description.english: Defeat GateKeeper at the old tower.
description.schinese: 在废塔战胜“守门人”。
description.german: Besiege den Torwächter am alten Turm.
description.french: Battez le Gardien dans l’ancienne tour.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Guardião na torre antiga.
description.japanese: 古いタワーの門番を倒す
description.romanian: Învinge-l pe Portar la vechiul turn.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Il Guardiano nella vecchia torre.
description.spanish: Derrota al Guardián de la Puerta en la vieja torre.
description.hungarian: Legyőzted a kapuőrt a régi toronyban.

displayName.french: Je suis bel et bien maudite

description.english: Defeat the Gate Keeper in his third form.
description.schinese: 战胜第三形态的“守门人”。
description.german: Besiege den Torwächter in seiner dritten Form.
description.french: Battez le Gardien dans sa troisième forme.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Guardião em sua terceira forma.
description.japanese: 第3形態の門番を倒す
description.romanian: Învinge-l pe Portar în a treia formă a lui.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Guardiano nella sua terza forma.
description.spanish: Derrota al Guardián de la Puerta en su tercera forma.
description.hungarian: Legyőzted a Kapuőrt a harmadik alakjában.

description.english: Solve the Box Of Ploutus.
description.schinese: 激活普路托斯魔盒。
description.german: Entschlüssele die Kiste des Plutos.
description.french: Résolvez l’énigme de la Boîte de Ploutus.
description.brazilian: Desvende a Caixa de Pluto.
description.japanese: プルートスの箱を解く
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma della scatola di Pluto.
description.spanish: Resuelve la caja de Ploutus.
description.hungarian: Megfejtetted Plútosz dobozát.

displayName.italian: Da Sola in mezzo a Loro

description.english: Encounter the first enemy.
description.schinese: 遭遇首个敌人。
description.german: Triff auf den ersten Gegner.
description.french: Rencontrez votre premier ennemi.
description.brazilian: Encontre seu primeiro inimigo.
description.japanese: 最初の敵に遭遇する
description.italian: Incontra il primo nemico.
description.spanish: Enfréntate al primer enemigo.
description.hungarian: Találkoztál az első ellenfeleddel.

description.english: Kill a Walker.
description.schinese: 杀死一只行尸。
description.german: Töte einen Ruhelosen.
description.french: Tuez un Walker.
description.brazilian: Mate um Morto-Vivo.
description.japanese: ウォーカーを殺す
description.italian: Uccidi un vagante.
description.spanish: Mata a un caminante.
description.hungarian: Megöltél egy járkálót.

description.english: Die for the first time.
description.schinese: 首次死亡。
description.german: Stirb zum ersten Mal.
description.french: Mourez pour la première fois.
description.brazilian: Morra pela primeira vez.
description.japanese: 最初の死
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez.
description.hungarian: Először haltál meg.

description.english: Kill a Follower.
description.schinese: 杀死一名邪教信徒。
description.german: Töte einen Anhänger.
description.french: Tuez un Follower.
description.brazilian: Mate um Seguidor.
description.japanese: カルト信者を殺す
description.italian: Uccidi un Seguace.
description.spanish: Mata a un Cultista.
description.hungarian: Végeztél egy követővel.

description.english: Kill all the walkers in the mansion.
description.schinese: 杀死洋馆里的所有行尸。
description.german: Töte alle Ruhelosen im Anwesen.
description.french: Tuez tous les walkers du manoir.
description.brazilian: Mate todos os mortos-vivos da mansão.
description.japanese: 屋敷内のウォーカーをすべて倒す
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i vaganti nella tenuta.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los caminantes de la mansión.
description.hungarian: Megölted az összes járkálót a kúriában.

description.english: Unlock all rooms from the Mansion.
description.schinese: 解锁洋馆里的所有房间。
description.german: Öffne alle Räume im Anwesen.
description.french: Débloquez toutes les pieces du manoir.
description.brazilian: Destranque todos os quartos da mansão.
description.japanese: 屋敷のすべての部屋を開錠する
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le stanze della tenuta.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las habitaciones de la Mansión.
description.hungarian: Kinyitottad az összes szobát a kúriában.

description.english: Finish the game without saving.
description.schinese: 不存档便通关。
description.german: Beende das Spiel ohne zu speichern.
description.french: Finissez le jeu sans sauvegarder.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem salvar.
description.japanese: セーブせずにゲームを終了する
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza salvare.
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin guardar.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a játékot mentés nélkül.

description.english: Obtain all weapons.
description.schinese: 获得所有武器。
description.german: Erhalte alle Waffen.
description.french: Obtenez toutes les armes.
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as armas.
description.japanese: すべての武器を入手する
description.italian: Trova tutte le armi.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las armas.
description.hungarian: Megszerezted az összes fegyvert.

description.english: Finish the game in under 3 hours.
description.schinese: 在3小时内通关。
description.german: Beende das Spiel in weniger als 3 Stunden.
description.french: Finissez le jeu en moins de 3 heures.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em menos de 3 horas.
description.japanese: 3時間以内にゲームを終了する
description.russian: Пройдите игру менее чем за 3 часа.
description.romanian: Termină jocul în mai puțin de 3 ore.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in meno di 3 ore.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de 3 horas.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a játékot 3 óra alatt.

description.english: Finish the game on Hard difficulty.
description.schinese: 在“困难”难度模式下通关。
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Finissez le jeu en difficulté Difficile.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Difícil.
description.japanese: 難易度Hardでゲームを完成する
description.russian: Пройдите игру на тяжёлом уровне сложности.
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Difficile.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad difícil.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a játékot nehéz nehézségi szinten.

description.english: Finish the game on Professional difficulty.
description.schinese: 在“专家”难度模式下通关。
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Profi.
description.french: Finissez le jeu en difficulté Profesionnel.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Profissional.
description.japanese: 難易度Professionalでゲームを完成する
description.italian: Termina il gioco a difficoltà Professionale.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad Profesional.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a játékot profi nehézségi szinten.

description.english: Finish the story in fixed camera mode.
description.schinese: 在监视器视角下通关。
description.german: Beende die Geschichte in der festen Kameraeinstellung.
description.french: Finissez le jeu en mode caméra fixe.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo de câmera fixa.
description.japanese: 固定カメラモードでストーリーを完成する
description.russian: Пройдите игру в режиме фиксированной камеры.
description.italian: Termina la storia in modalità telecamera fissa.
description.spanish: Termina la historia en modo de cámara fija.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a történetet rögzített kamerás módban.

description.english: Finish the game in Over The Shoulder mode.
description.schinese: 在越肩视角下通关。
description.german: Beende das Spiel im [Über-die-Schulter]-Modus.
description.french: Finissez le jeu en mode Troisème Personne.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo Terceira Pessoa.
description.japanese: 肩越し視点でゲームを完成する
description.russian: Пройдите игру с видом от третьего лица.
description.romanian: Termină povestea în modul (Vedere Peste Umăr).
description.italian: Termina il gioco in modalità Sopra la spalla.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en el modo Por encima del hombro.
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a történetet váll feletti módban.

description.english: Unlock all 5 gates.
description.schinese: 解锁5扇元素之门。
description.german: Öffne alle 5 Tore.
description.french: Débloquez les 5 portes.
description.brazilian: Destranque todos os portões.
description.japanese: 5つのゲートをすべて解除する
description.italian: Sblocca tutti e 5 i cancelli.
description.spanish: Desbloquea las 5 puertas.
description.hungarian: Kinyitottad mind az 5 kaput.

description.english: Find all documents in the game.
description.schinese: 找到游戏内的所有文件。
description.german: Finde alle Dokumente im Spiel.
description.french: Trouvez tous les documents du jeu.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os documentos do jogo.
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべての文書を見つける
description.italian: Trova tutti i documenti nel gioco.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los documentos del juego.
description.hungarian: Megtaláltad az összes dokumentumot a játékban.

description.english: Unlock all costumes.
description.schinese: 解锁所有服装。
description.german: Schalte alle Kostüme frei.
description.french: Débloquez tous les costumes.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os trajes.
description.japanese: すべてのコスチュームを解除する
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i costumi.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los trajes.
description.hungarian: Feloldottad az összes ruhát.

description.english: Unlock the secret ending.
description.schinese: 解锁隐藏结局。
description.german: Schalte das geheime Ende frei.
description.french: Débloquez la fin secrète.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o final secreto.
description.japanese: 秘密のエンディングの解除
description.italian: Sblocca il finale segreto.
description.spanish: Desbloquea el final secreto.
description.hungarian: Feloldottad a titkos befejezést.

description.english: Kill all the enemies in the village before time runs out.
description.schinese: 在时间用尽前杀死村庄里的所有敌人。
description.turkish: Zaman dolmadan köydeki tüm düşmanları öldürün.
description.german: Töte alle Gegner im Dorf bevor die Zeit ausgeht.
description.french: Tuez tous les ennemis dans le village avant que le temps ne s’écoule.
description.brazilian: Mate todos os inimigos do vilarejo antes que o tempo acabe.
description.koreana: 시간이 다 가기 전에 마을의 모든 적을 죽여라.
description.japanese: 時間切れになる前に、村にいるすべての敵を倒す
description.russian: Убейте всех врагов в особняке прежде, чем истечёт время.
description.romanian: Omoară toți inamicii din sat înainte de expirarea timpului.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i nemici nel villaggio prima che scada il tempo.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los enemigos del pueblo antes de que se acabe el tiempo.
description.hungarian: Megölted az összes ellenséget a faluban az idő lejárta előtt.

description.english: Finish the story with an S+ Rank on "Professional".
description.schinese: 在“专家”难度模式下以S+评级通关。
description.german: Beende die Geschichte mit dem Rang S+ auf [Profi].
description.french: Terminez l'histoire avec un rang S+ en difficulté [Professionnel].
description.brazilian: Termine a história com a classificação S+ em [Profissional].
description.japanese: 難易度Professional S+でストーリーを完成する
description.russian: Завершите сюжет с оценкой S+ на сложности “Профессионал”.
description.romanian: Termină povestea cu un rang S+ în modul (Profesional).
description.italian: Termina la storia con il voto S a livello [Professionista].
description.spanish: Termina la historia con un rango S+ en [Profesional].
description.hungarian: Teljesítetted a történetet S+ ranggal [profi] nehézségi szinten.

description.english: You can pet the dog in Them and Us.
description.schinese: 在《孤岛诡影 Them and Us》中抚摸狗狗。
description.german: Du kannst den Hund in Them and Us streicheln.
description.french: Vous pouvez caresser le chien dans Them and Us.
description.brazilian: Você pode fazer carinho no cachorro em Them and Us.
description.koreana: Them and Us에서 개를 쓰다듬을 수 있습니다.
description.japanese: Them and Usでは犬を撫でることができます
description.russian: В Them and Us Вы можете погладить собаку.
description.romanian: Poți mângâia câinele în Them and Us.
description.italian: Puoi accarezzare il cane in Them and Us.
description.spanish: Puedes acariciar al perro en Them and Us.
description.hungarian: Megsimogattad a kutyát a Them and Us-ban.
